Header: 62 Division Marks Its 9th Anniversary with Collective Events
Content: 62 Division Headquarters of the Security Force Headquarters - Wanni (SFHQ-W) at Galkulama, Padavi Sripura turned 9 years old in September and marked its anniversary with a series of religious and military formalities during 8 - 10 September. The anniversary commemoration consisted of military formalities, religious observances, tree planting, dinner night, musical evening and a cricket tournament. Major General Dhammika Jayasinghe, General Officer Commanding (GOC), 62 Division on the anniversary day received honours in a Guard Turn Out and a Parade in the premises.
